description.description: The contacts description, meant to be displayable on the admin dashboard.

email.description: The contacts email address. This is the default email to send order invoices to.

metadata.description: Set of key-value pairs that you can attach to an object. This can be useful for storing additional information about the object in a structured format.

phone.description: The contacts phone number. This is for record keeping only.

source.description: Where the contact was created from.
